text: Ruslan Karimov (born 22 May 1986) is an Uzbek cyclist, who last rode for . ==Major results== Sources: ;2005 : 2nd Road Race, National Road Championships ;2006 : 3rd Overall Tour de Korea ;2007 : 1st 20px Road Race, National Road Championships ;2010 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time Trial ::2nd Road Race : 3rd Circuito del Porto : 5th Piccolo Giro di Lombardia : 10th Tour of Taihu Lake ;2011 : 2nd Road Race, National Road Championships : 5th Trofeo Franco Balestra : 5th Circuito del Porto ;2014 : 1st 20px Road Race, National Road Championships : 9th Asian Road Race Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Road Race, National RoadChampionships ;2017 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road Race ::2nd Time Trial ==References== ==External Links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Uzbekistani male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Cyclists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Uzbekistan
title: Ruslan Karimov
